body:
#### PR description:

Title says is all, somewhat inspired by the discussion at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37016#issuecomment-1048065481

#### PR validation:

Run successfully `runTheMatrix.py -l imited --ibeos`

title: introduce `GenericTriggerEventFlag::fillPSetDescription` and use it in several clients
